select oe.id, oe.order_id, oe.user_id, oe.pharmacy_id, oe.score, oe.content, oe.images, oe.create_date, oi.code, oi.total_cost, ui.name, ui.address AS userAddress, phi.name AS pharmacyName from order_evaluate oe left join order_info oi on (oi.id = oe.order_id) left join pharmacy_info phi on (phi.id = oe.pharmacy_id) left join user_info ui on (ui.id = oe.user_id) where 1 = 1
AND oi.code LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.orderCode},'%')
AND ui.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.userName},'%')
AND phi.name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{orderEvaluate.pharmacyName},'%')
AND ui.user_id = #{orderEvaluate.userId}
order by oe.create_date desc
